attributes.action: Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education
attributes.additional_details:
All university students are paying full price for less than half of the education they were promised and were previously being provided.

On top of this they have to pay extortionate prices for accommodation when they don't even have to be near the campus.

We want justice for the students especially for those who are not in the best financial situation.

Do the right thing for the new generation coming into society
attributes.background: We want refunds for all university student tuition fees for the 20/21 academic year as well as reimbursements for the final term of the previous academic year due to the drop in quality of education when switching to online learning.
